caption.title: Photographs of the study system in the Cordillera Real of Bolivia (above 4500 m).
caption.p: A. Wetland in the arid landscape of the puna, B. Proximity of wetlands and glaciers, C. Cushion plants ( Distichia muscoides) composing the wetlands, D. Example of a bird species ( Chloephaga melanoptera) tightly dependent on wetlands. Â© Fabien Anthelme (A) and Olivier Dangles (B-D).
